wrongFullText:
LeBron James Savannah Brinson - P 2012

LeBron James has tied the knot with longtime girlfriend Savannah Brinson.

US Weekly reports the Miami Heat star wed his high school sweetheart in San Diego on Saturday, as a number of stars looked on, including Lance Bass, NBA player Dwyane Wade, actress Gabrielle Union, singer Neyo, and Jamie-Lynn Sigler.

PHOTOS: Hollywood’s Magazine Cover Weddings

Ahead of the wedding, Page Six reported the wedding would be kept small, and was being planned by Preston Bailey, who organized Sean Parker‘s Lord of the Rings nuptials earlier this summer.

In July, TMZ obtained an invitation to the top-secret wedding. The invitations were vague, listing a “Welcome Barbeque” at 7 p.m. Friday and a “Farewell Brunch” at 10:30 a.m. Sunday, but listing no address.

The couple have two children together, LeBron James, Jr., 8, and Bryce Maximus, 6. James proposed on New Year’s Eve 2011.
